feed.title: Speedtest Tracker Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v0.21.0 (Added Gotify, Slack, HealthCheck, Pushover and Ntfy webhook notification channels)
entry.content:
What's New

  • Add Gotify notifications via webhook by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1561
  • Add Slack notification via webhook by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1522
  • Add HealthCheck.io notification via webhook by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1567
  • Add Pushover notification via webhook by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1574
  • Add ntfy notification via webhook by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1579
  • Add Ookla result URl to notification by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1615

What's Changed

  • Add Placeholder text for notifications by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1570
  • Fix notification layout by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1639
  • Laravel 11.20.0 Shift by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1644
  • Release v0.21.0 by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1648

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v0.20.9...v0.21.0

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v0.21.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Validate ping url by @nandi95 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1662
  • Use latest docker tag in README by @earthpyy in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1711
  • Bump vite from 5.4.0 to 5.4.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1713
  • Bump rollup from 4.20.0 to 4.22.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1724
  • Laravel 11.24.1 Shift by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1727
  • [Bug] Remove writing server_id to an column for failed speedtests by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1679
  • Laravel 11.27.2 Shift by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1749
  • [Chore] improve composer.json by @wilsenhc in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1746
  • Release v0.21.3 by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1752

New Contributors

  • @nandi95 made their first contribution in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1662
  • @earthpyy made their first contribution in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1711
  • @wilsenhc made their first contribution in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1746

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v0.21.2...v0.21.3
